name: Thailand
visaRequirements: Visa-free or visa-on-arrival for many countries, check specific requirements
languages: English widely spoken in tourist areas

about.description: Thailand is a Southeast Asian country known for its tropical beaches, opulent royal palaces, ancient ruins, and ornate temples. From the bustling city of Bangkok to the islands of Phuket and Koh Samui, Thailand offers a vibrant mix of culture, cuisine, and adventure.

travelTips.bestTimeToVisit: November to February for cool, dry weather; March to May is hot; June to October is rainy season
culturalNotes: Respect for the monarchy and Buddhism is important
Tipping is not mandatory but appreciated
